block: XML.com: XML From the Inside Out -- XML development, XML resources, XML specifications Antoine Quint gives a round-up of viewers and editors for SVGThe XML app package problem may be ripe for community solutionWeb Services need to relate XML and programming language typesXML in Electronic Court Filing by Ken Pittman Nov. 14, 2001 An overview of how XML is finding application in several electronic court filing pilot schemes throughout the US. XML::LibXML - An XML::Parser Alternative by Kip Hampton Nov. 14, 2001 Kip Hampton discusses XML::LibXML, a capable, updated alternative to Perl's venerable and venerated XML::Parser. DOM and SAX Are Dead, Long Live DOM and SAX by Kendall Grant Clark Nov. 14, 2001 The XML developer community finds that DOM is often inappropriate, while SAX is too hard to grasp. The XML-Deviant covers a discussion on the usage and future for these APIs. High Hopes for the Universal Business Language by Edd Dumbill Nov. 07, 2001 The Universal Business Language (UBL) is a new effort to standardize XML business documents, being spearheaded by Jon Bosak. In this interview, Bosak describes UBL's aims and its relationship to ebXML. Introduction to Native XML Databases by Kimbro Staken Oct. 31, 2001 Native XML databases are an important part of the emerging XML software infrastructure. This article explains their features, strengths and weaknesses.  Xybrix XML application construction kit [ xmlhack]  RTF to XSL-FO converter [ xmlhack]  XML-Spy gets XSL-FO support [ xmlhack]  Megginson's RDF-Filter moves to Sourceforge [ xmlhack]  NextWare 2002 conference call for participation [ xmlhack]  MS Outlook interface to RDF calendars [ xmlhack]  xsbrowser [ XML.com Resource Guide]  XML Validator [ XML.com Resource Guide]  Xybrix XML Application Construction Kit [ XML.com Resource Guide]  XML Event Model published [ xmlhack]  ODRL Version 1.0 Submitted to ISO/IEC MPEG for Rights Data Dictionary and Rights Expressio...  Auto-ID Center Uses Physical Markup Language in Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) Tag ...  University of Chicago Oriental Institute Announces XML System for Textual and Archaeologic...  UDDI Version 2 Technical Specification Now Supported by Four Public Implementations.  TIGERS Work Group Releases Draft XML Schemas for Electronic Income Tax Submission.  NISO Ballots the Digital Talking Book Standard.  NEMI, IPC, and RosettaNet Publish Three Key Product Data Exchange (PDX) Standards.
